page.title: 03FARMING STRACATHRO
page.content:
As our area consists mainly of agricultural land, we have been noting the crops grown and the reasons for their growth. The main cereal grown is {barley}for the whisky industry and for animal feeding.{Silage,grass and hay are grown to feed the many store cattle,and{turnips,forage rape and {hay}for the sheep.
A fairly new crop to the area is {oil-seed rape}which produces oil and animal food-stuff.A small part of the land is given over to the production of{crocuses and daffodils}for the bulb-trade and,unusually,{evening {primrose}for the drugs industry.
There is also a fair amount of land given over to{potato-growing,}both for seed and for eating.
